hero.title: DEFINING UNIQUENESS
hero.subtitle:
Shree Advaya Studio is the expression of uniqueness, Tradition , heritage, and thoughtful craftsmanship—born from a long-standing friendship and a shared vision.

Sanmathi and Sadhana, neighbours for years and trusted companions, transformed their deep appreciation for fine sarees into a purposeful partnership. What began as a bond rooted in familiarity and trust evolved into a refined venture dedicated to celebrating timeless Indian drapes.

Each partner brings a distinct strength to the studio—one with a discerning eye for design, aesthetics, and curation, the other with an innate understanding of quality, detail, and customer sensibility. Together, their complementary skills create a harmonious balance, shaping a brand that reflects sophistication, authenticity, and excellence.

More than a brand, Shree Advaya Studio is a story of trust, passion, and refined taste—woven into every thread we offer.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content:
The information provided on this website is for general informational purposes only. While we strive to keep the information up to date and accurate, we make no representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied, about the completeness, accuracy, reliability, suitability, or availability of the products or related graphics contained on the website.

Product colors may vary slightly from the images shown due to photography lighting and screen settings. We recommend contacting us for detailed information before making a purchase.

shipping.title: Shipping & Delivery
shipping.content:
We offer PAN India and worldwide shipping.

**Domestic Shipping (India):**
- Standard delivery: 5-7 business days
- Express delivery: 2-3 business days
- Free shipping on orders above ₹5000

**International Shipping:**
- Delivery time: 10-15 business days
- Shipping charges calculated at checkout based on destination

All orders are carefully packed to ensure your saree reaches you in perfect condition. Tracking information will be shared via WhatsApp/Email once your order is dispatched.

returns.title: Return & Exchange Policy
returns.content:
We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase.

**Returns:**
- Returns accepted within 7 days of delivery
- Product must be unused, unwashed, and in original packaging
- Tags must be intact

**Exchanges:**
- Exchanges available for size/color within 7 days
- Subject to product availability

**Non-Returnable Items:**
- Customized or altered products
- Products purchased during sale

To initiate a return or exchange, please contact us via WhatsApp with your order details and photos of the product.

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.content:
Once we receive and inspect the returned item, we will process your refund.

**Refund Timeline:**
- Refund initiated within 3-5 business days after inspection
- Amount credited to original payment method within 7-10 business days

**Refund Amount:**
- Full product amount refunded for eligible returns
- Original shipping charges are non-refundable
- Return shipping costs borne by customer unless product is defective

For any queries regarding refunds, please contact us via WhatsApp or email.
